# createCommandInstance(with:)

**Instance Method**

Creates and returns an instance of the command object described by the receiver in the specified memory zone.

## Declaration

```swift
func createCommandInstance(with zone: NSZone? = nil) -> NSScriptCommand
```

## Parameters

- **zone**: The memory zone from which to allocate the command.

## Return Value

The command object, instantiated from [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSScriptCommand] or a subclass.

## Creating Commands

- **createCommandInstance()**: Creates and returns an instance of the command object described by the receiver.
